detaileddescription.para: nfs4_FhandleToFSAL: converts a nfs4 file handle to a FSAL file handle.
Converts a nfs4 file handle to a FSAL file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the file handle to be converted
[OUT] pointer to the extracted FSAL handle

detaileddescription.para: nfs3_FhandleToFSAL: converts a nfs3 file handle to a FSAL file handle.
Converts a nfs3 file handle to a FSAL file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the file handle to be converted
[OUT] pointer to the extracted FSAL handle

detaileddescription.para: nfs2_FhandleToFSAL: converts a nfs2 file handle to a FSAL file handle.
Converts a nfs2 file handle to a FSAL file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the file handle to be converted
[OUT] pointer to the extracted FSAL handle

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_FSALToFhandle: converts a FSAL file handle to a nfs4 file handle.
Converts a nfs4 file handle to a FSAL file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] pointer to the extracted file handle
[IN] pointer to the FSAL handle to be converted
[IN] pointer to NFSv4 compound data structure.

detaileddescription.para: nfs3_FSALToFhandle: converts a FSAL file handle to a nfs3 file handle.
Converts a nfs3 file handle to a FSAL file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] pointer to the extracted file handle
[IN] pointer to the FSAL handle to be converted
[IN] pointer to the export list entry the FH belongs to

detaileddescription.para: nfs2_FSALToFhandle: converts a FSAL file handle to a nfs2 file handle.
Converts a nfs2 file handle to a FSAL file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] pointer to the extracted file handle
[IN] pointer to the FSAL handle to be converted
[IN] pointer to the FSAL handle to be converted

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_FhandleToExportId
This routine extracts the export id from the file handle NFSv4

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to manage.

detaileddescription.para: nfs3_FhandleToExportId
This routine extracts the export id from the file handle NFSv3

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to manage.

detaileddescription.para: nfs2_FhandleToExportId
This routine extracts the export id from the file handle NFSv2

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to manage.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty
This routine is used to test if a fh is empty (contains no data).

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to test.

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull, NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE is fh is empty.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo
This routine is used to test if a fh refers to pseudo fs

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to test.

simplesect.para: TRUE if in pseudo fh, FALSE otherwise

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired
This routine is used to test if a fh is expired

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to test.

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull. All the FH are persistent for now.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid
This routine is used to test if a fh is invalid.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to test.

detaileddescription.para: nfs2_FhandleCheckSum
Computes the checksum associated with a nfsv2 file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the file handle whose checksum is to be computed.

detaileddescription.para: nfs3_FhandleCheckSum
Computes the checksum associated with a nfsv3 file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the file handle whose checksum is to be computed.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_FhandleCheckSum
Computes the checksum associated with a nfsv4 file handle.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the file handle whose checksum is to be computed.

detaileddescription.para: print_fhandle2
This routine prints a NFSv2 file handle (for debugging purpose)

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to print.

detaileddescription.para: print_fhandle3
This routine prints a NFSv3 file handle (for debugging purpose)

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to print.

detaileddescription.para: print_fhandle4
This routine prints a NFSv4 file handle (for debugging purpose)

parameterdescription.para: [IN] file handle to print.

detaileddescription.para: print_buff
This routine prints the content of a buffer.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] buffer to print.
[IN] length of the buffer.

detaileddescription.para: print_compound_fh
This routine prints all the file handle within a compoud request's data structure.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] compound's data to manage.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_sprint_fhandle : converts a file handle v4 to a string.
Converts a file handle v4 to a string. This will be used mostly for debugging purpose.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] pointer to the file handle to be converted to a string.
[INOUT] pointer to the char * resulting from the operation.

briefdescription.para: Some tools for managing the file handles.

detaileddescription.para:
Author
deniel
Date
2006/01/24 11:43:05
Revision
1.12
nfs_filehandle_mgmt.c : Some tools for managing the file handles.

Log
nfs_filehandle_mgmt.c,v Revision 1.12 2006/01/24 11:43:05 deniel Code cleaning in progress
Revision 1.11 2006/01/11 08:12:18 deniel Added bug track and warning for badly formed handles
Revision 1.10 2005/11/28 17:03:03 deniel Added CeCILL headers
Revision 1.9 2005/09/07 08:58:30 deniel NFSv2 FH was only 31 byte long instead of 32
Revision 1.8 2005/09/07 08:16:07 deniel The checksum is filled with zeros before being computed to avoid 'dead beef' values
Revision 1.7 2005/08/11 12:37:28 deniel Added statistics management
Revision 1.6 2005/08/09 12:35:37 leibovic setting file_handle to 0 in nfs3_FSALToFhandle, before writting into it.
Revision 1.5 2005/08/08 14:09:25 leibovic setting checksum to 0 before writting in it.
Revision 1.4 2005/08/04 08:34:32 deniel memset management was badly made
Revision 1.3 2005/08/03 13:23:43 deniel Possible incoherency in CVS or in Emacs
Revision 1.2 2005/08/03 13:13:59 deniel memset to zero before building the filehandles
Revision 1.1 2005/08/03 06:57:54 deniel Added a libsupport for miscellaneous service functions
Revision 1.4 2005/07/28 12:26:57 deniel NFSv3 PROTOCOL Ok
Revision 1.3 2005/07/26 07:39:15 deniel Integration of NFSv2/NFSv3 In progress
Revision 1.2 2005/07/21 09:18:42 deniel Structure of the file handles was redefined
Revision 1.1 2005/07/20 12:56:54 deniel Reorganisation of the source files
